job description:
A growing client has an opening for a Senior Data Analyst.

Senior Data Analyst will perform healthcare data analysis. Primary responsibilities will be to:
  • Plan and execute data collection
  • Summarize data and communicate analytical results
  • Develop customized templates and formats for reporting data
  • Interpret and identify trends in the data
  • Create and maintain data documentation, such as data dictionaries
  • Assist with client user training classes as needed
  • Understand client data requirements for new implementations and enhancements and work with other departments to execute
  • Strive for continuous improvements of processes, quality, methods and documentation
Education & Experience
  • B.S. or M.S. preferred in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
  • 3 to 5 years of professional work experience focusing on data analysis in Medicaid, Medicare, or Private Insurance data.
  • Questioning, inquisitive approach to work with the ability to learn
  • Possess the ability to analyze complex data and prepare ad hoc analysis
  • Familiarity with or ability to learn relevant BI tools and data analytic systems
  • Proficient with MS Excel
  • Experience with SQL or similar scripting language
